title: A Coffee & Chocolate Experience at Club Mareva Beirut

content.raw:
On Thursday, February 13, 2025, Club Mareva Beirut hosted a delightful Coffee and Chocolate Masterclass, a free event that brought together coffee and chocolate lovers for an exquisite tasting experience. The event was a collaboration between Lollo Caffè, renowned for its boutique-quality Neapolitan coffee, and Choco Blossom, experts in crafting custom Belgian chocolates.

A Journey Through Flavor

The evening was dedicated to exploring the rich and complex profiles of coffee and chocolate, two of the most beloved indulgences in the world. Participants had the unique opportunity to learn about the art of coffee brewing and chocolate making, while enjoying carefully curated pairings that highlighted the best characteristics of both.

Expert-Led Masterclass

Industry experts from Lollo Caffè and Choco Blossom guided attendees through the intricate process of selecting and preparing high-quality coffee and chocolate. They shared insights into:
  • The origins and roasting methods of premium coffee beans.
  • The craftsmanship behind Belgian chocolate and its various flavor profiles.
  • The perfect pairings of coffee and chocolate, enhancing the tasting experience.

An Evening of Elegance and Discovery

Club Mareva Beirut, known for curating premium tasting experiences, provided the perfect setting for this indulgent event. Guests enjoyed exclusive coffee and chocolate samples, experiencing firsthand the harmonious fusion of flavors.

Community and Connection

Beyond the tastings, the event fostered a sense of community among coffee and chocolate aficionados. Guests engaged in discussions, exchanged personal tasting notes, and discovered new ways to appreciate these luxurious treats.

Exclusive Private Events

All events at Club Mareva Beirut are private gatherings, ensuring an intimate and curated experience. To join us in the future, one must visit the club, immerse themselves in the experience, and become part of our community. We take the time to get to know each guest personally before adding them to our exclusive guest list.

Stay Tuned for More!

The Coffee and Chocolate Masterclass was a resounding success, and we look forward to hosting more engaging experiences at Club Mareva Beirut. Keep an eye on our upcoming events and be part of our growing community of gourmet enthusiasts.
